pages.title: Kamen Rider G Den-O
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Cho Den-O Trilogy: EPISODE YELLOW: Treasure DE-End Pirates (2010, movie)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:den_o/devices/g_den_o_belt)G Den-O Belt$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed III$(li)Resistance$(li)Night Vision$(li)Regeneration$(li)Strength
